_header: Sitteth all still and harkeneth to me
_description: Song of the Battle of Lewes — eight 7-line stanzas with refrain, ‘Richard þah þou be euer trichard / tricchen shalt þou neuermore’

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Sitteþ alle stille and herkeneþ to meþe kyn of
                    alemaigne bi mi leaute…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…al he shulde quite here tuelfmoneþ stotshulde he neuer
                    more wiþ his fot potto helpe wyndesoreRichard et
                    cetera
